itemtagconverter.command.tagconverter._m: You must be holding an item!
itemtagconverter.command.tagconverter._n: The tag or item {0} does not exist.
itemtagconverter.command.tagconverter.he: /tagconverter detect - shows the tag names for the currently held item
/tagconverter dump - lists out all item tags
/tagconverter find <tag> - lists items with the specified tag
/tagconverter list - lists the currently configured conversions
/tagconverter add - Adds the currently held item as the default for all of its tags.
/tagconverter add <tag/item> <optional item> - Adds the currently held item or optional item as the default convert for the specified tag or item.
/tagconverter reload - Reloads the configuration file from disk.
/tagconverter remove [tag] - Removes either a specific tag's conversion or all conversions for tags on the held item if no tag is specified.
/tagconverter convert [all] - Convert all item in your inventory or send 'all' into the second argument to convert all players currently in the server
itemtagconverter.command.tagconverter.ad: Added §6{0}§r as the default conversion for the §6{1}§r tag
§4The item has no tags (or all of its tags are blacklisted to prevent mass conversion). You may consider manually adding a direct conversion to the config file and running §6/tagconverter reload§4.§r
itemtagconverter.command.tagconverter.re: Removed conversion with tag §c{0}§r, if it exists
itemtagconverter.command.tagconverter.co: All Items in {0} have been converted !
itemtagconverter.command.tagconverter.pa: This command can only be run as a player !
tooltip.itemtagconverter.converter.1: Pipe items into the top and out of the bottom, they will be converted within.
